job title: Sr Data Technology Analyst - Java Developer
job description:
Job Description:

Participates in development activities to implement strategic Data Management capabilities. Works with lines of business to define required updates to the enterprise metadata platform. Builds and deploys new capabilities into the metadata platform, in collaboration with other development resources.

Required Skills:

5 years Java development experience

5 Years data management experience

Desired Skills:

Collibra experience

Mulesoft development experience
